name: RamboSlothStrikesBackOnTheCrabOrder
description:
2D shooter created over 1.5 week at Forsbergs Skola

Save The Rainforest from being destroyed by The Evil Crobster who wants to expand his beach.

Controller Is Recommended for co-op

Designers

  • Andrew Brierly Chramer  Lead Game Designer, Level Designer, Scripting
  • Oliver Jonasson Lead Programmer, Game Designer, Level Designer

Artist

  • Rafael Art Director, Boss Design, Sfx Design
  • Jimmie Main Character Design In Menu and Scenes
  • Elliot Enemy Design, Enemy Animation
  • Theodor Main Character Design Ingame
  • Albin Enviroment Artist, Concept Enemies,
